name: JumTP [PROTOTYPE]
description:
Prototype series 3: JUMP

Teleport and solve little puzzles (jumping!) CONTROLS

WASD to move.

Right Click to fix objective.

Left Click to jump (only when the objective is fixed).

This game have a little bug where you can fix objectives behind walls. The puzzles are designed to not see those objectives, so avoid them if is possible or the experience will not be the same :D

Followed a tutorial of "Mix and Jam" to do most of this features.

The goal of this series is to experiment with different challenges, mechanics, dynamics & aesthetics. For each prototype there will be given a different theme.

All the prototypes are made in 1 day using (preferably) Unreal Engine 3.

Prototype 3/3
